title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 941/96 of 28 May 1996 amending Annexes II, III, VIII and XI of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3030/93 on common rules for imports of certain textile products from third countries and repealing Regulation (EC) No 2635/95 introducing prior surveillance of imports of certain textile products originating in the United Arab Emirates
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 941/96 of 28 May 1996 amending Annexes II, III, VIII and XI of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3030/93 on common rules for imports of certain textile products from third countries and repealing Regulation (EC) No 2635/95 introducing prior surveillance of imports of certain textile products originating in the United Arab Emirates
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The present Regulation shall not prevent the importation
- of products falling under categories 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 20, 21, 26, 157 and 161 which on the date of its entry into force could have been imported under the provisions of Regulation (EC) No 2635/95 on the basis of an import document delivered by the competent authorities of the Member States,
- of products falling under category 2, which before the date of its entry into force were shipped to the Community.

This Regulation shall enter into force the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall be applicable as of 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 May 1996.
For the Commission
Leon BRITTAN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 275, 8. 11. 1993, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 323, 30. 12. 1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 67, 10. 3. 1994, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 79, 29. 3. 1996, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 271, 14. 11. 1995, p. 1.
(6) Not yet published in the Official Journal.
